name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch Clip Downloader - Twitch To Mp4

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch Clip Downloader - Trusted and Free Twitch Clips and Videos Download.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many users have the need to download clips and videos on twitch platform, but it does not support downloading directly on its platform. Twichclipdownloader is an extension that helps users download clips to their devices easily.
You just need to install our extension on the chrome toolbar and you can download your favorite videos and clips on Twitch.

Instructions for using the utility:
Step 1: Install this extension for chrome browser
Step 2: Open the utility and paste the Twitch clip Url in the toolbar, then click download.
Step 3: Choose the video quality to download.

With our extension. You can download Clip twitch anytime and it's free.
Thank you for using the service
